view.name: system, basic, detailed, video, grid, gamecarousel

text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: The 64DD is a magnetic floppy disk drive peripheral for the Nintendo 64 game console developed by Nintendo. It was announced in 1995, prior to the Nintendo 64's 1996 launch, and after numerous delays was released in Japan on December 13, 1999.

text.name: TextDescShort
text.text: The 64DD is a magnetic floppy disk drive peripheral for the Nintendo 64 game console developed by Nintendo.
